name: Pangea.app
headline: Hire Fractional Marketing + Design Talent
description:
The best way to know if someone is a good fit is to work with them on a project before you hire them full-time. 

At Pangea, we make contract-to-hire easy and painless.

We'll work with you to provide a shortlist of top, interested candidates.  

Our talent have an average of 5-7+ years of experience in design, growth, ops, product, and engineering, and are primarily based in the USA (but also extend to 155 countries)

founders.name: Adam Alpert, Founder
founders.description:
Started off as a freelance videographer in middle school, and now I am one of the co-founders of Pangea.app; a platform we built to enable fractional hiring. 

Featured in Techcrunch, Boston Globe, Inc.Magazine and named one of 25u25 in RI.

Living in NYC,

founders.name: John Tambunting, Founder
founders.description:
Hello world! My name is John and I'm the CTO of Pangea.app. I discovered my passion for coding through attending hackathons while in college (github.com/jtambunt). I graduated from Brown with an Applied Mathematics degree.

I'm dedicated to creating serious value in the world because I was fortunately given every opportunity to succeed by my family. This is what motivates me. My parents came to the US from the Philippines with nothing to their names and were able to actualize the American Dream.

## Find the right fractional talent, faster than ever.
We’ve spent years perfecting our recruiting system.It’s time you took advantage.
### AI-Powered Matching
Find diamond-in-the-rough talent with our industry-leading Talent Matching Algorithm. Our team of experts will connect you with the right talent, right off the bat.
[Find your Match →](https://www.pangea.app/</match>)
![Pangea connects rising companies with top fractional talent](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601b11355524e6d8f07a33a6/66ad1755d9bcf3d5db2548c7_boliviainteligente-GC6CUNdDL9Y-unsplash.jpg)![Start hiring with Pangea's industry-leading AI matching algorithm today](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601b11355524e6d8f07a33a6/669572eee254f623edb36a81_AI%20Rank%20Circles.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601b11355524e6d8f07a33a6/644ffd65510e196239c2e9da_day%20badge.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601b11355524e6d8f07a33a6/644ffd66064087c20d90ab23_week%20badge.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601b11355524e6d8f07a33a6/644ffd657d505314505739b0_month%20badge.svg)
## Millions Served
We’ve helped power thousands of clients, from startups to the fortune 500, to new heights.
### 155+
Pangea has a network of vetted, global talent across 155+ countries
### 4,000+
Hires facilitated to top companies
### 4.6/5 on G2
![Pangea is rated 4.6/5 Stars on G2 and Product Hunt](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601b11355524e6d8f07a33a6/66b66a719f17c8664e1be909_star_rating.svg)
Highly rated and reviewed on G2 and Product Hunt
## The best marketing& design talent
Source the best candidates in marketing and design from across the globe. They might just be a few miles away.
![Pangea connects rising companies with top fractional talent](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601b11355524e6d8f07a33a6/66ad1755d9bcf3d5db2548c7_boliviainteligente-GC6CUNdDL9Y-unsplash.jpg)![Start hiring with Pangea's industry-leading AI matching algorithm today](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601b11355524e6d8f07a33a6/66ccd61210535f6421148eb8_Intl%20Talent%20-%20Orange.png)
### Top Talent Only
Tap into a global network of thousands of high-performers from FAANG, unicorns, and top agencies. Search in the USA, Canada, or any other country to complete your team.
[Start Hiring →](https://www.pangea.app/</match>)
## Enterprise Ready
We work with companies of all sizes, from 10 person startups to 10,000+ global organizations.
### VMS Integreation
We can integrate directly into your Vendor Management System (VMS) for streamlined billing. 
[Talk with us →](https://www.pangea.app/</match>)
### Account Manager
Enterprise clients receive a named account manager and access to complementary background checks. 
[Start Hiring →](https://www.pangea.app/</match>)
### Your Global EOR
We act as the Employer on Record (EOR) so you can compliantly work with talent across the globe. 
[Book Demo →](https://www.pangea.app/</match>)
## 3 steps tothe perfect match
We’ve broken down the hiring process so the only decisions you have to make are the ones that matter.
[Talent Expert](https://www.pangea.app/<#>)[Interview Candidates](https://www.pangea.app/<#>)[Sign Contract](https://www.pangea.app/<#>)
### Talk with a Talent Expert
Our team of talent experts has years of experience selecting the right candidates for roles just like yours. In a quick call, we’ll find out everything we need to know to find your match.
[Start Hiring →](https://www.pangea.app/</match>)
![Pangea connects rising companies with top fractional talent](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601b11355524e6d8f07a33a6/66ad1755d9bcf3d5db2548c7_boliviainteligente-GC6CUNdDL9Y-unsplash.jpg)![Start hiring with Pangea's industry-leading AI matching algorithm today](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601b11355524e6d8f07a33a6/66c3871935e7cfc7d9f7cc5d_Talent%20Expert%20Yellow%205.avif)
### Quickly book interviews
Once you have your pick, scheduling an interview takes a matter of seconds. With availability pulled directly from candidates’ calendars, you can book a call as quickly as today.
[Start Hiring →](https://www.pangea.app/</match>)
![Pangea connects rising companies with top fractional talent](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601b11355524e6d8f07a33a6/66ad1755d9bcf3d5db2548c7_boliviainteligente-GC6CUNdDL9Y-unsplash.jpg)![Start hiring with Pangea's industry-leading AI matching algorithm today](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601b11355524e6d8f07a33a6/66c38b263a0be4342c0d113d_Book%20Interview%20Yellow%202.avif)
### And hire in seconds
Cross the finish line with a couple of clicks as you sign a contract with your new freelancer. We protect you with the standard Pangea contract, and make time-tracking & payments seamless.
[Start Hiring →](https://www.pangea.app/</match>)
![Pangea connects rising companies with top fractional talent](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601b11355524e6d8f07a33a6/66ad1755d9bcf3d5db2548c7_boliviainteligente-GC6CUNdDL9Y-unsplash.jpg)![Start hiring with Pangea's industry-leading AI matching algorithm today](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601b11355524e6d8f07a33a6/66c38a8a17d781d5db816af5_Sign%20Contract%20Yellow%202.avif)

You shouldn’t have to compromise when hiring a marketer or a designer to join your team. From a few hours a week to full time, get the same quality of talent.
### Fast
Ready to work in 24 hours or less, every time. Because your deadlines don’t wait for anyone.
[Start Hiring →](https://www.pangea.app/</match>)
### Professional
Already at your level and ready to preform, Pangeans are experienced to

![Pangea connects rising companies with top fractional talent](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601b11355524e6d8f07a33a6/66ad1755d9bcf3d5db2548c7_boliviainteligente-GC6CUNdDL9Y-unsplash.jpg)![Start hiring with Pangea's industry-leading AI matching algorithm today](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601b11355524e6d8f07a33a6/66cccf25b3ff026e2b00d292_W2%201099.png)

Every contract can convert to a W2 at any time, so when you know you’ve found your teammate, you can bring them on board.

## A full-featuredhiring platform
We’re with you on every step of the hiring journey. Our platform supports you even after you’ve found the one.
[Job Posts](https://www.pangea.app/<#>)[Candidates](https://www.pangea.app/<#>)[Interviews](https://www.pangea.app/<#>)[Assignments](https://www.pangea.app/<#>)[Invoices](https://www.pangea.app/<#>)
### Generate a job post in seconds
We take care of the tedious parts of hiring. Pangea builds off of thousands of successful freelance placements to craft the perfect job description and responsibilities for your role. Access our private network of experts faster than ever before.
[Start Hiring →](https://www.pangea.app/</match>)
![Pangea connects rising companies with top fractional talent](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601b11355524e6d8f07a33a6/66ad1755d9bcf3d5db2548c7_boliviainteligente-GC6CUNdDL9Y-unsplash.jpg)![Start hiring with Pangea's industry-leading AI matching algorithm today](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601b11355524e6d8f07a33a6/66ccd570b219ed983ad64018_Job%20Post%20-%20Blue.png)
### Get hand-picked top candidates
Our team leverages our industry-leading Pangea AI and our years of hiring experience to select the top applicants for your role as Pangea’s Picks. You’ll get a detailed email with each one and a link to easily schedule an interview with your favorite.
[Start Hiring →](https://www.pangea.app/</match>)
![Pangea connects rising companies with top fractional talent](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601b11355524e6d8f07a33a6/66ad1755d9bcf3d5db2548c7_boliviainteligente-GC6CUNdDL9Y-unsplash.jpg)![Start hiring with Pangea's industry-leading AI matching algorithm today](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601b11355524e6d8f07a33a6/66ccd571a3b68bc2d93aaca7_Talent%20Selection%20-%20Blue.png)
### Interview scheduling without the stress
Forget the email chains. Schedule a call with any one of your candidates in a flash with our call booking feature. Available in the hiring manager, youc an select time from the candidate’s availability and send an invitation directly to their calendar.
[Start Hiring →](https://www.pangea.app/</match>)
![Pangea connects rising companies with top fractional talent](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601b11355524e6d8f07a33a6/66ad1755d9bcf3d5db2548c7_boliviainteligente-GC6CUNdDL9Y-unsplash.jpg)![Start hiring with Pangea's industry-leading AI matching algorithm today](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601b11355524e6d8f07a33a6/66ccd57233e907186dee2b35_Video%20Call%20-%20Blue.png)
### Assign and track projects and tasks
Pangea also empowers you to assign projects and tasks without leaving the tab with our built-in project manager. Your freelancers will see their tasks and can log hours and mark their progress.
[Start Hiring →](https://www.pangea.app/</match>)
![Pangea connects rising companies with top fractional talent](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601b11355524e6d8f07a33a6/66ad1755d9bcf3d5db2548c7_boliviainteligente-GC6CUNdDL9Y-unsplash.jpg)![Start hiring with Pangea's industry-leading AI matching algorithm today](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601b11355524e6d8f07a33a6/66ccd570a8d6de0af2c745ac_Progress%20-%20Blue.png)
### Receive and pay invoices securely
An even easier way to pay your contractors. We facilitate your payments through our secure payment gateway, powered by Stripe, where you can complete invoices with a credit card or an ACH transfer.
[Start Hiring →](https://www.pangea.app/</match>)
![Pangea connects rising companies with top fractional talent](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601b11355524e6d8f07a33a6/66ad1755d9bcf3d5db2548c7_boliviainteligente-GC6CUNdDL9Y-unsplash.jpg)![Start hiring with Pangea's industry-leading AI matching algorithm today](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601b11355524e6d8f07a33a6/66ccd570747fe14b077b95f7_Invoice%20-%20Blue.png)

## Frequently Asked Questions
View more questions & answers [here](https://www.pangea.app/</resources/faq>)
### Why choose Pangea for your marketing and design needs?
At Pangea, we redefine how businesses connect with top-tier marketing and design talent. Our platform bridges the gap between organizations looking for world-class expertise and professionals who are ready to deliver exceptional results. Whether you're a startup, a growing company, or an established enterprise, Pangea provides access to a curated network of fractional talent, enabling you to scale your projects efficiently and cost-effectively.
We understand that finding the right talent can be a challenge. That’s why we leverage cutting-edge AI matching technology to ensure that every hire perfectly aligns with your project goals, company culture, and budget. Our platform is designed to take the guesswork out of hiring by connecting you with experts who specialize in everything from content marketing and graphic design to user experience (UX) design and social media strategy. This means you get more than just a freelancer—you gain a trusted partner invested in your success.
### How does Pangea work for businesses?
Pangea is more than just a marketplace—it’s a talent ecosystem built around your needs. The process begins with your job posting, where you outline your project requirements, timelines, and desired outcomes. Our sophisticated AI instantly matches you with pre-vetted professionals who meet your criteria. From there, you can review candidate profiles, conduct interviews, and select the perfect match for your team.
Once the project kicks off, our platform continues to support you every step of the way. From streamlined communication tools to secure payment processing, Pangea ensures a seamless experience for both clients and talent. Need to scale up quickly? Our talent pool includes professionals who are not only skilled in their fields but also experienced in working remotely, enabling you to expand your team without the overhead of traditional hiring.
### What are the benefits of choosing Pangea for fractional hiring?
1. Access to Top Talent: Our global network features only the best marketing and design professionals, all of whom are rigorously vetted for their skills, experience, and English fluency. This ensures you’re working with experts who can deliver high-quality results, no matter the scope of your project.
2. Flexibility and Scalability: Whether you need a one-time project completed or ongoing support, Pangea offers flexible hiring options that adapt to your business needs. Our focus on fractional work means you can access specialized skills without committing to full-time hires.
3. Speed and Efficiency: Time is money, and our platform is designed to save you both. With AI-powered matching and a streamlined hiring process, you can connect with the right talent in a fraction of the time it would take through traditional methods.
4. Cost-Effective Solutions: Pangea helps you maximize your budget by offering access to fractional talent. Pay only for the work you need without sacrificing quality or expertise.
5. Transparent and Supportive: Transparency is at the heart of everything we do. From transparent pricing to open communication channels, our platform is built to foster trust and collaboration between clients and talent.
### How can I empower my business by hiring talent on Pangea?
The future of work is here, and it’s flexible, efficient, and global. At Pangea, we believe in empowering businesses to achieve their goals by providing access to the best talent, tools, and support. Whether you’re launching a new marketing campaign, refreshing your brand identity, or building a user-friendly website, Pangea is your partner in success.
Join the thousands of businesses that have discovered the Pangea difference. Let us help you build your dream team, execute your vision, and drive measurable results. With Pangea, the possibilities are endless.

## Frequently Asked Questions
View more questions & answers here⟨28⟩
### Why choose Pangea for your marketing and design needs?
At Pangea, we redefine how businesses connect with top-tier marketing and design talent. Our platform bridges the gap between organizations looking for world-class expertise and professionals who are ready to deliver exceptional results. Whether you're a startup, a growing company, or an established enterprise, Pangea provides access to a curated network of fractional talent, enabling you to scale your projects efficiently and cost-effectively.
We understand that finding the right talent can be a challenge. That’s why we leverage cutting-edge AI matching technology to ensure that every hire perfectly aligns with your project goals, company culture, and budget. Our platform is designed to take the guesswork out of hiring by connecting you with experts who specialize in everything from content marketing and graphic design to user experience (UX) design and social media strategy. This means you get more than just a freelancer—you gain a trusted partner invested in your success.
### How does Pangea work for businesses?
Pangea is more than just a marketplace—it’s a talent ecosystem built around your needs. The process begins with your job posting, where you outline your project requirements, timelines, and desired outcomes. Our sophisticated AI instantly matches you with pre-vetted professionals who meet your criteria. From there, you can review candidate profiles, conduct interviews, and select the perfect match for your team.
Once the project kicks off, our platform continues to support you every step of the way. From streamlined communication tools to secure payment processing, Pangea ensures a seamless experience for both clients and talent. Need to scale up quickly? Our talent pool includes professionals who are not only skilled in their fields but also experienced in working remotely, enabling you to expand your team without the overhead of traditional hiring.
### What are the benefits of choosing Pangea for fractional hiring?
1. Access to Top Talent: Our global network features only the best marketing and design professionals, all of whom are rigorously vetted for their skills, experience, and English fluency. This ensures you’re working with experts who can deliver high-quality results, no matter the scope of your project.
2. Flexibility and Scalability: Whether you need a one-time project completed or ongoing support, Pangea offers flexible hiring options that adapt to your business needs. Our focus on fractional work means you can access specialized skills without committing to full-time hires.
3. Speed and Efficiency: Time is money, and our platform is designed to save you both. With AI-powered matching and a streamlined hiring process, you can connect with the right talent in a fraction of the time it would take through traditional methods.
4. Cost-Effective Solutions: Pangea helps you maximize your budget by offering access to fractional talent. Pay only for the work you need without sacrificing quality or expertise.
5. Transparent and Supportive: Transparency is at the heart of everything we do. From transparent pricing to open communication channels, our platform is built to foster trust and collaboration between clients and talent.
### How can I empower my business by hiring talent on Pangea?
The future of work is here, and it’s flexible, efficient, and global. At Pangea, we believe in empowering businesses to achieve their goals by providing access to the best talent, tools, and support. Whether you’re launching a new marketing campaign, refreshing your brand identity, or building a user-friendly website, Pangea is your partner in success.
Join the thousands of businesses that have discovered the Pangea difference. Let us help you build your dream team, execute your vision, and drive measurable results. With Pangea, the possibilities are endless.

generated_description:
Pangea.app is a revolutionary platform that aims to simplify the process of hiring fractional marketing and design talent. Founded in 2016 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W21, Pangea's mission is to make contract-to-hire partnerships seamless and effective.

At the core of Pangea’s philosophy is the idea that the best way to assess whether someone is a good fit for your needs is to collaborate on a project before making a long-term commitment. Sharing this sentiment, Pangea has built a robust network of qualified professionals—primarily based in the USA, but also spanning 155 countries—who bring an average of over 5-7 years of experience across various sectors such as design, growth, operations, product, and engineering.

With just a small team in New York, Pangea efficiently connects businesses with top-tier candidates. Their service is designed to understand client needs intimately and provide a curated shortlist of candidates, making the hiring process not only quicker but also far less painful. Whether you're a startup or an established enterprise, Pangea is adaptable enough to cater to all sizes and scopes of recruitment.

Using cutting-edge AI technology, Pangea facilitates an impressive matching system that links businesses with qualified candidates almost instantly. In fact, the platform claims talent can be available for hire in as little as 24 hours. This efficiency doesn't sacrifice quality, allowing companies to tap into a diverse pool of professionals from top-tier companies and renowned agencies. 

Pangea prides itself on the flexibility of its offerings, allowing businesses to hire specialists for either short-term projects or long-term roles with the option to transition from contract (1099) to full-time employment (W2) as needed. Their focus on transparency and support enhances the client experience with features like streamlined communication, easy interview scheduling, and secure payment processing.

If you’re looking to source top marketing and design talent without the complexities of traditional hiring methods, Pangea.app might just be the platform you need. It empowers businesses to efficiently scale their projects while maintaining high standards of expertise and professionalism—a real game changer in the realm of recruiting.

For more information, check out their website at [Pangea.app](https://www.pangea.app).
